calendar.notPast: Reservation window cannot be added in the past
calendar.notConsecutive: Reservation windows must not be consecutive
calendar.cantModifyPast: Ongoing or past reservation windows cannot be modified
calendar.cantMovePast: Ongoing or past reservation windows cannot be moved
calendar.cantMoveToPast: Reservation window cannot be moved to the past
